code: import Box from'@mui/material/Box';import Slider from'@mui/material/Slider';import{useFilter}from'../../../context/filter-context';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const minDifference=500;function valuetext(value){return"".concat(value);}export const PriceRange=()=>{const{priceRange,filterDispatch}=useFilter();const handlePriceChange=(event,newValue,activeThumb)=>{if(!Array.isArray(newValue)){return;}if(activeThumb===0){filterDispatch({type:"MINIMUM_PRICE",payload:{newValue,priceRange,minDifference}});}else{filterDispatch({type:"MAXIMUM_PRICE",payload:{newValue,priceRange,minDifference}});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{width:300},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slider,{className:"price-range",getAriaLabel:()=>'Minimum Differecne',value:priceRange,valueLabelDisplay:"on",getAriaValueText:valuetext,min:100,max:25000,disableSwap:true,onChange:handlePriceChange})});};
